listitem.para: [pierre] - Disable debug symbols for seamonkey, as we do for other mozilla applications. This allows building on i686.
[renodr] - Fix building Samba with xfsprogs-5.19 and glibc-2.36. Fixes #16939.
[renodr] - Fix the download URL for the libxml2 python2 module.
[pierre] - Fix building xine-lib with binutils-2.39. Fixes #16940.
[renodr] - Fix building hdparm with glibc-2.36. Fixes #16931.
[renodr] - Adapt CMake's FindBoost module to understand Boost-1.80.0.
[thomas] - Fix mkinitramfs script to include missing files. Fixes #16929.
[bdubbs] - Update to kf5 apps version 22.08.0. Fixes #16650.
[bdubbs] - Update to kf5-5.97.0 includes extra-cmake-modules-5.97.0, oxygen-icons5-5.97.0, and breeze-icons-5.97.0. Fixes #16657.
[thomas] - Update to bind-9.18.6 and bind-utils-9.18.6. Fixes #16919.
[renodr] - Update the Java binary for i686 to 18.0.2+8. Fixes #16822.
[renodr] - Update to evolution and evolution-data-server 3.44.4. Fixes #16869.
[renodr] - Add text to the GDM page on starting GNOME from the command line.
[renodr] - Update to OpenJDK-18.0.2 (Security Update). x86 binary will come later today or tomorrow. Fixes #16822.

[ken] - Update dependent perl modules: B-Hooks-EndOfScope-0.26, DateTime-1.58, DateTime-Locale-1.35, DateTime-TimeZone-2.52, File-Listing-6.15, File-ShareDir-Install-0.14, HTTP-Message-6.37, List-UtilsBy-0.12, Package-Stash-0.40, Specio-0.48, Test2-Suite-0.000145, Test-File-1.992, Text-CSV_XS-1.48. Addresses #13850.
[ken] - Biber needs a corresponding version of biblatex, add biblatex-3.18a. Fixes #16693.
[renodr] - Update blfs-systemd-units to 20220720, fixing a bug where lightdm.service could get enabled alongside lxdm.service.
[pierre] - Fix building firefox against alsa without pulseaudio. Fixes #16764.
[pierre] - Add MOZBUILD_STATE_PATH variable for thunderbird. Fixes #16806.
[bdubbs] - Update to gnome-shell-42.3.1 and gnome-shell-extensions-42.3. Fixes #16739.
[renodr] - Adapt Xorg Fonts instructions to look for any tarball by a given name, instead of locking to bz2.
[renodr] - Fix the documentation directory in VIM.
[renodr] - Added text to libportal to set the available backends.
[renodr] - Update to audacious and audacious-plugins-4.2. Provides support for ffmpeg-5. Fixes #16762.
[renodr] - Remove ffmpeg support from transcode since libavresample has been removed from ffmpeg. This allows building and using this package again.
[renodr] - Disable libva support in VLC so that it builds with ffmpeg-5. Upstream has said that no port will be available for VLC-3 due to complexity, but it will be available again in VLC-4.
[renodr] - Turn off ffmpeg support in libquicktime.
[renodr] - Documented how to use ffmpeg with pipewire.

[ken] - Update to thunderbird-102.0 (security fix) and use clang for it. Fixes #16712. If updating from thunderbird-91 series, please check that ticket for dependency updates and build changes. This completes #16697.

[ken] - Update to firefox-102.0esr (security fix) and use clang for it. Fixes #16708 If updating from firefox-91 series, please check that ticket (or the wiki) for dependency updates and build changes, and for information if your firefox profile is shared across multiple systems with the same /home. This addresses part of #16697.
[ken] - Update to JS91.11.0 (security fix) and recommend clang to build it to save time. Fixes #16695 and addresses part of #16697.
[ken] - Use clang to build SeaMonkey to save time. First part of #16697.
[ken] - Update to qtwebengine-5.15.10 (security fix) and patch it to use python3. Fixes #16687.
[ken] - Really remove create-mach-environment from thunderbird. Fixes #15405.
[ken] - Fix firefox and thunderbird for change in current cbindgen. Fixes #16681.
[renodr] - Update to alsa-lib and alsa-plugins 1.2.7.1. Fixes #16679.
[pierre] - Update to gstreamer, gst-plugins-base, gst-plugins-bad, gst-plugins-good, gst-plugins-ugly, gst-libav, and gstreamer-vaapi-1.20.3 (security update). Fixes #16670.
[pierre] - Fix file MIME type detection in glib2, so that webkitgtk based web browsers are able to display file:// URL's again.
[renodr] - Update tracker and tracker-miners to 3.3.1. Fixes #16615.
[ken] - Update to nss-3.79 (seems to include security fixes). Fixes #16613.
[ken] - Update to firefox-91.10.0 (security fix) and JS-91.10.0. Fixes #16606.
[bdubbs] - Update to gnome-shell and gnome-shell-extentions-42.2. Fixes #16604.
[xry111] - Update to vim-8.2.5014. Sync with LFS.
[xry111] - Update to systemd-251. Sync with LFS. Fixes #16566.
[pierre] - Update to MIT Kerberos V5-1.20. Fixes #16584.
[thomas] - Make talloc and krb a recommended dependency for cifs-utils.
[ken] - Update to thunderbird-91.9.1 (security fix re javascript in rss feeds, which is enabled by default). Fixes #16564.
[ken] - Update to firefox-91.9.1 and JS-91.9.1 (security fix for each of these). Fixes #16563.
[bdubbs] - Update to kf5-gear-22.04.1 (was kf5-apps). Includes kate, kwave, and falkon. Fixes #16190 and #16265.
[bdubbs] - Update to kf5-5.94.0, including extra-cmake-modules, breeze-icons, and oxygen-icons5. Fixes #16226.
[pierre] - Add cairo to the list of recommended dependencies of texlive. Fixes #16530.
[ken] - Update to Intel microcode-20220510 (Security Update). Fixes #16528.
[renodr] - Use the systemd unit for rpcbind provided by upstream.
[xry111] - Update to vim-8.2.4814 (security fix). Sync with LFS.
[bdubbs] - Update to gstreamer-1.20.2 gst-plugins-base gst-plugins-good gst-plugins-bad gst-plugins-ugly gst-libav gstreamer-vaapi. Fixes #16504.
[ken] - Update to firefox-91.9.0 (security fix) and js-91.9.0. Fixes #16498.
[bdubbs] - Update to LWP (Perl module libwww-perl-6.64). Fixes #16492.
[pierre] - JS-91 needs the same fix as firefox for 32 bit machines.
[bdubbs] - Update to evolution and evolution-data-server 3.44.1. Fixes #16454.
[bdubbs] - Update to bind and bind-utilities-9.18.2. Fixes #16442.
[renodr] - Fix building Inkscape with poppler-22.04.0. Fixes #16433.
[bdubbs] - Update to openssh-9.0p1. Includes ssh-askpass. Fixes #16387.
[renodr] - Fix a typo in babl's meson.build file that causes it to not build. Reported by John Burrell.
[pierre] - Add a note about the extracted directories in LLVM. Fixes #16385.
[pierre] - Update to yelp-42.1. Fixes second part of #16289.
[pierre] - Update to yelp-xsl-42.0. Fixes first part of #16289.
[pierre] - Update to trackers-miner-3.3.0. Fixes second part of #16283.
[pierre] - Update to gnome-shell-extensions-42.0. Fixes second part of #16269.
[pierre] - Update to gnome-shell-42.0. Fixes part of #16269.
[pierre] - Patch systemd for new kernel headers in 5.17.
[ken] - Update to firefox-91.8.0 (security update) and JS-91.8.0. Fixes #16374.
[bdubbs] - Update to gstreamer-1.20.1. Includes gst-plugins-{base,good,bad,ugly}, gstlibav, and gstreamer-vaapi. Fixes #16233.
[ken] - Fix x265 when git has not been installed.
[bdubbs] - Add libunwind-1.6.2 in support of sysprof-3.44.0.
[bdubbs] - Add libadwaita-1.1.0 in support of GNOME-42. Fixes #16271.
[renodr] - Add the JSON perl module for Samba.
[bdubbs] - Enable gtk4 library for libnma. Fixes #16273.
[timtas] - Added optional x265 dependency for heif support in imlib2-1.8.1.
[xry111] - Update to vim-8.2.4567 (security fix). Sync with LFS.
[pierre] - Allow elogind to exit when dbus is closed. Fixes #16177.
[renodr] - Fix building Inkscape with poppler-22.03.0. Fixes #16209.
[pierre] - Update to openssh-8.9p1 with ssh-askpass. Fixes #16163.
[xry111] - Download polkit from FDO GitLab and run its test suite.
[xry111] - Add polkit-0.120 patch for JS-91. Addresses #15368.
[xry111] - Update to vim-8.2.4489 (security fixes). Sync with LFS.
